thread.title: Carnival Targets Agents With Email Marketing Initiative
thread.title_full: Carnival Targets Agents With Email Marketing Initiative

title: Carnival Targets Agents With Email Marketing Initiative
text:
Carnival Targets Agents With Email Marketing Initiative June 30, 2015 
Carnival Cruise Line is aiming a new email marketing initiative at travel agents who are new to selling Carnival cruises. In a five-part “Welcome to Fun” program, Carnival will educate agents on using the cruise line’s travel agent portal , Travel Partner Toolbox and the company’s Travel Agents Rewards Program. Agents who want to register should go to Carnival’s website . 0
